body_html:
Oh wait, from the stack trace I see you're using keras.max_norm instead of tf.keras.max_norm. Is that accurate? Could you switch to tf.keras.max_norm instead?

Note that the Keras implementation in tf.keras includes features (such as compatibility with eager execution) that are not part of the keras package.

body:
Oh wait, from the stack trace I see you're using `keras.max_norm` instead of `tf.keras.max_norm`. Is that accurate? Could you switch to `tf.keras.max_norm` instead?

Note that the Keras implementation in `tf.keras` includes features (such as compatibility with eager execution) that are not part of the `keras` package.
